name: day-20-qr-code-generator
description: QR codes is short for “Quick Response code”. These codes are used to store information. The information is stored in the pixels of a square-shaped grid. QR codes are the type of barcodes that can be read by image-oriented digital devices, such as a digital camera. Almost every modern smartphone has a built-in QR reader that we use to do payments, open applications, download apps, for E-commerce, and so on.
